FuncDef: This command configures the contents of the auto-generated subscriber ID when theipoe-sub-id-keycommand is set to includesap-idand thedef-sub-idcommand is configured withuse-auto-id. The VLANs must be configured so that the subscriber ID length is not exceeded.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the SAP + AP delimiting tags is used.
Specifies that the SAP only is used.
